item.title: Pressure Stop Fitting Assemblies (Upper Deck Door(s)) – Freighter without Draw-Through Smoke Detection System – Flight Pressurized Manual Mode ONLY

remarks.para: One forward fitting assembly and/or one aft fitting assembly per door may be missing or inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: There are no visible defects on remaining fitting assemblies for associated door(s),
Cabin altitude auto controller is operative,
Maximum cabin pressure differential is limited to 3.0 psi.
Use Manual Cabin Altitude Control. Do not exceed maximum cabin pressure differential limit of 3.0 psi.

note.para: When at 17,000 ft. MSL with a 3.0 psi. cabin pressure differential, the cabin altitude will be approximately 8,000 ft.

numlitem.para: Flight is limited to 17,000 ft. MSL.

placard.para: Placard below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel: "U/D DOOR ____ PRESS STOP FITTING MISSING/INOP: MAX PRESSURE DIFF 3.0 PSI". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually inspect remaining fittings on affected door(s) for defects.
